briefTitle: A Study of Gefapixant (MK-7264) in Japanese Adult Participants With Refractory or Unexplained Chronic Cough (MK-7264-038)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-blind Clinical Study to Evaluate the Long-term Safety and Efficacy of MK-7264 in Japanese Adult Participants With Refractory or Unexplained Chronic Cough
summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the safety of two doses of gefapixant (MK-7264) in Japanese adult participants with refractory or unexplained chronic cough.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Experienced at Least One Adverse Event (AE)
